articles.content:
The No. 5 Texas Longhorns will be without redshirt freshman edge Colton Vasek on Saturday against the Florida Gators in Austin, according to the Friday injury report from the Longhorns.

articles.author: Dave Deckard
articles.title: Report: Former Blazers Radio Voice Brian Wheeler Dies - Blazer's Edge
articles.description: The Blazers family loses a long-time member.
articles.content:
The Portland Trail Blazers family has lost a long-time member, as former radio play-by-play broadcaster Brian Wheeler has died. The report comes from media member Kerry Eggers.
